entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
